channel.title: Fixing dupe
channel.description: hey guys need help fixing dupe glitch in my server. on my server people can log in to the same account on two clients and dupe like that. how can i fix it to where if they try to log in to the same account on two clients one of the accounts gets kicked? im having trouble finding this out. or if there is an alternative way can you tell me that? thanks in advanced
